mapper.select: SELECT order_number FROM instock where date(create_time)=date(now()) ORDER BY create_time desc limit 0,1;
mapper.insert: insert into instock (supplier_id, create_time, order_number) value(#{supplierId} ,now(),#{orderNumber});
mapper.select: select * from instock where id=#{instockNweId} and status=1;
mapper.update: update instock set total_money=#{totalPrice} where id=#{instockNweId};
mapper.select: select i_d.id id, i_d.amount amount,i_d.original_price price from instock_detail i_d inner join instock i on i_d.instock_id = i.id where i_d.goods_id=#{goodId} and i.supplier_id=#{SupplierId} order by i.create_time;
mapper.update: update instock_detail set status=0 where id=#{instockDetailId};
